content: As the battle concludes, the lute-ing headless man will return to continue his ballad. A large imposing stone door stands before you, and a small shining statue near it can’t be interacted with unless you possess both the Sterness of Stone and Keeness of Tiger. If you listen to the headless man’s song, he’ll offer a clue: To beat the yellow rat sage who rules this place, you’ll need to defeat his henchmen who carry the keys to this door.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair'.
The content is as follows:
As the battle concludes, the lute-ing headless man will return to continue his ballad. A large imposing stone door stands before you, and a small shining statue near it can’t be interacted with unless you possess both the Sterness of Stone and Keeness of Tiger. If you listen to the headless man’s song, he’ll offer a clue: To beat the yellow rat sage who rules this place, you’ll need to defeat his henchmen who carry the keys to this door.
